entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is Harry's cousin who has a large, pink hand. He is mentioned as having a different personality after being affected by the dementors.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story who interacts with Dudley and Aunt Petunia. He has a conversation with Dudley about his changed behavior.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is Harry's aunt who is emotional and upset throughout the scene. She seems to be hiding something from Harry.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are supernatural creatures that have affected Dudley's personality.

relationships.description: Harry and Dudley had a conversation in the scene, with Harry trying to understand why Dudley has changed behavior.
Harry and Aunt Petunia also interacted in the scene, with Aunt Petunia being emotional and trying to leave quickly.
The dementors affected Dudley's personality, causing him to change his behavior.
